response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is valued at $1,500,000 by us. Considering its immense worth to you, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with a substantial saving while ensuring a fair return for our investment in developing such a high-quality product. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
